name: Cryptocurrency Mining Pools
author: PR Wire Pro

sections.description:
Cryptocurrency Mining Pools is a plugin that displays a list of cryptocurrency mining pools in your WordPress sidebar or any widget area of your wordpress blog. Please visit our main site for plugin support at https://prwirepro.com

Displays in your sidebar or any menu area that allows you to use widgets, a list of cryptocurrency mining pools in your WordPress sidebar or any widget area of your wordpress blog.

For any plugin support issues, please message us through our main website anytime at https://prwirepro.com. White Label Press Release Distribution services are also available for companies looking to promote news on behalf of their clients, reports can be fully customized with your logo and website url. Interested in other cryptocurrency plugins please visit https://cryptoducats.com. To learn more about our wp press release distribution plugin please see view here https://wordpress.org/plugins/press-release-distribution/.

Credits
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and Upload cryptocurrency-mining-pools.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory inside of a folder named “/cryptocurrency-mining-pools”

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Then go to the Widgets section of your wordpress site and simply drag and drop the widget titled “Cryptocurrency Mining Pools” to any widget area of your website. You can also activate the widget through any wordpress menu on your site.
sections.faq:
What minimum version of WordPress is required?

This plugin requires minimum version 1.0 or later of WordPress.

What are the licensing terms?

This plugin is available for free under the GNU General Public License, Version 2.

What is the latest tested version of WordPress this is compatible with?

This plugin has been tested up to version 5.61 of WordPress.

Does this plugin have any issues with any other plugins or themes?

This plugin is safe and fully tested with all current version of WordPress. Works fine with all other plugins, works perfectly with yoast wordpress seo plugin, contact form 7, akismet, also jetpack, and also works perfectly with any theme, no compatibility issues with any plugins or any other themes. This plugin is tested and safe for your wp site or blog and fully responsive and tested in all browsers.

How can I find more information about the plugin?

For any additional questions please contact support at anytime. You can use our contact form on our website or contact support through our email – Contact https://cryptocurrencymarket.capital
